name: Life of the Party (FranSan)
description:
Keep the party alive from midnight 'til five!

All your friends are heading over to your place and it's your job to maintain the life of the party by cleaning up, refilling snacks, taking drinks, hitting the dance floor and participating in some light gambling.

If you let too many empties pile up or let the stereo be on the fritz for too long, it'll kill the life of the party! Make sure to be a good host.

  • Arrow keys = Movement
  • Z = Interact
  • X = Exit
